About the Company: Odyssey Corporation Ltd was incorporated and is engaged in the activity of corporate finance and advisory services. Odyssey Corporation Ltd produced product such as Shares, Film Rights  Traded, Manganese Ore  Traded, Shares, Film. Odyssey Corporation Enters into Film distribution business. Odyssey Corporation has ambitious plans and projects for development, global sourcing & distribution, aiding local trading & production of manufacturing & processing services, financing & managing of promising business activities, providing local talents, skills and knowledge-based efforts with solidity and impetus for exponential growth.
